Name: Battery-out
About the game: Battery-out is an action platformer with power routing. Midori the multipurpose robot has reawakened on a post-apocalyptic world after years of slumber! Join him on his journey across Overrun Factory, Biting Forest and Sleepless City! Features: -A power routing system, allowing you to switch between three modes on the fly! -Limited energy supply, shared between all 3 modes and batteries! -3 locations with unique gameplay! -A sufficiently charming robot. -A variety of equally charming enemies and obstacles that encourage different playstyles!
